basics.name: Ricardo Jesus Huaman Kemper
basics.label: Researcher
basics.summary: Electronic Engineer with a strong interest in Robotics and AI.

work.name: Cardiff University
work.summary: Led a project to integrate foundational models with robotics to enhance human-robot interaction.
highlights: Developed pipelines to improve robots’ responsiveness in various settings using NLP techniques.

work.name: Universidad Privada Antenor Orrego
work.summary: Worked on agricultural mobile robots’ autonomous navigation systems using SLAM, path planning, and ROS.
highlights: Developed computer vision pipelines for agricultural classification tasks.

work.name: CorAll Development & Research S.A.C.
work.summary: Managed data administration and supported ML/DL algorithm development for specific project needs.

publications.name: Performance Evaluation of the ROS Navigation Stack using LeGO-LOAM
Artificial vision strategy for Ripeness assessment of Blueberries on Images taken during Pre-harvest stage in Agroindustrial Environments using Deep Learning Techniques
Deep Learning-based Segmentation and Classification System for Artichoke Seedling Grading
Linear Quadratic Regulator (LQR) Control for the Active Suspension System of a Four-Wheeled Agricultural Robot
